/usr/bin/c++    -frounding-math -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/BSmoothing.dir/BSmoothing.cpp.o  -o BSmoothing  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libmpfr.so -lgmp /usr/local/lib/libCGAL.so -lboost_thread -lboost_system -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libCGAL.so -lboost_thread -lboost_system -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
